# 作业

判断成绩是否高于各科均值，是就1 否则0

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

df <- tibble::tribble(
    ~name, ~chinese, ~engish, ~physics, ~sport, ~music,
   "Aice",       85,      56,       56,     54,     78,
    "Bob",       75,      78,       77,     56,     69,
   "Cake",       69,      41,       88,     89,     59,
   "Dave",       90,      66,       74,     82,     60,
    "Eve",       68,      85,       75,     69,     21,
    "Fod",       77,      74,       62,     74,     88,
  "Gimme",       56,      88,       75,     69,     34
  )
df
```


```{r}
df %>%
  mutate(
    across(-name, ~ if_else(.x > mean(.x), 1, 0))
  )
```
